section.heading: Report on full deployment of autonomous vehicles.
section.text: Within one year after the applicability date of the Autonomous Vehicles Testing Program Amendment Act of 2020, passed on 2nd reading on September 22, 2020 (Enrolled version of Bill 23-232), the Department shall transmit to the Council a report that provides recommendations to safely accommodate the deployment of autonomous vehicles on public roadways for commercial, personal, and any other use the Department determines. The report may include draft legislation or regulations.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 23-156: § 3 of D.C. Law 23-156 provided that the creation of this section by § 2(c) of D.C. Law 23-156 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
